pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Zero-One (2019, TV show)$(br2)Used to craft Horobi's $(l:zero_one/devices/forceriser_horobi)MetsubouJinrai Forceriser (Horobi)$(/l)$(br2)Used to access Zero-One's $(l:zero_one/riders/zero_one#sting_scorpion)Sting Scorpion$(/l) form
